text:
Hello there,
First of all best wishes for 2023

I'm trying to connect my .NET API to HubSpot. I've tried using ChinChilla <http://HubSpot.net|HubSpot.net> for (<https://github.com/Chinchilla-Software-Com/HubSpot.NET>). I'm not able to connect with the api.

Has anyone tried connecting with .NET? If so can you help me out?
Oh shoot. I was hoping to be able to use that for my data sync.

Happy new year :fireworks:, Carter.

I have created a custom CRM Card on the Contact Hub.
I'm trying to add the feedback survey data into the CRM Card (The survey data of the selected user).
But I can't find the documentation (or I got it wrong)
Can you give me some information to integrate the feedback survey data to CRM Card?
Yep currently it's closed off to just internal HubSpot development

Basically you're going to need to create a serverless function to handle the webhook, then you'll have the serverless function get the survey's using the surveys api (linked above), then you'll send the information back to the crm card in a response

Hello Carter,
Let me try to do it based on your advise.
Thank you!
